Firstly Talking About Packing ,It Was Fully Packed (I was Little Worry About
That Before Delivery),That means If You Feel Shy in Asking About Condoms At
Medical Shops,Amazon Is There For You.Thus Packing Part Was Upto The Mark.  
Now Taking Its Pros And Cons  
  
Pros:-  
1.Transparent And Well Lubricated Condoms.  
2.Ultra thin,It feels like you did not even wear a condom.  
3\. Gripping Is Good.  
4\. No Loss In Sensitivity,You Will Almost Feel Like Natural.

Great Product!!! Prompt Delivery!!! Value of money, No details mentioned on
the package... only " health and personal care product" discretion maintained
... thanks Amazon

A decent condom in this price range. My partner liked it very much. It feels
nothing between us except long lasting pleasure. Thanks amazon.  
Pros:  
1.Max lubricant  
2.Really ultra thin  
3\. Size is perfect for Indians.  
Cons  
1\. Does not smell good  
2\. Costly than other brands  
3\. On the package it was mentioned 'condom', so no privacy.  
Overall my rating will be 4.5 star

Awesome product, me and my girlfriend just loved it. Its so thinand gives skin
to skin pleasure. Thank you durex for this lovely product.

Best deal!

The package was delivered discretely and the product was undamaged.  
The Durex FeelThin condoms are a great experience for both him and her. It is
surprisingly durable given its size, and quite stretchable at that. It is the
next best thing to skin to skin contact. While the only thing which I find
missing is the wetness, she reports that it is almost the same as me going
raw.  
One of the problems which I've faced with these is the loss of lubrication
over prolonged periods of time. Useage with some lubricant would be adviced.
Apart from that, this product is extremely durable and I haven't found a
single torn condom which is remarkable given the thin texture of the material.

Loved it
